title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 487/89 of 27 February 1989 on the supply of olive oil as food aid
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 487/89  of 27 February 1989  on the supply of olive oil as food aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Olive oil shall be mobilized in the Community, as Community food aid for supply to the recipients listed in the Annex in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 2200/87 and under the conditions set out in the Annex Supplies shall be awarded by  the tendering procedure.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
